definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="text_binary_ops"><value name="A"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">a</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="variables_get_string"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:correctAnswer</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_close_gui"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Correct!</field></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:score</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:score</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">20</field></block></value></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="entity_close_gui"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Incorrect.
